enchantment_lore.minecraft:protection.de:
Protection

Max Level: IV

Reduces most types of damage by 4% for each level.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:unbreaking.de:
Unbreaking

Max Level: III

Increases item durability.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:thorns.descri:
Thorns

Max Level: III

Reflects some of the damage taken when hit, at the cost of reducing durability with each proc.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:sweeping.desc:
Sweeping Edge

Max Level: III

Increases sweeping attack damage.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:soul_speed.de:
Soul Speed

Max Level: III

Increases walking speed on soul sand or Soul Soil.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:smite.descrip:
Smite

Max Level: V

Increases damage to undead mobs.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:silk_touch.de:
Silk Touch

Max Level: I

Mined blocks drop themselves.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:sharpness.des:
Sharpness

Max Level: V

Increases damage.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:riptide.descr:
Riptide

Max Level: III

Trident launches player with itself when thrown. Functions only in water or rain.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:respiration.d:
Respiration

Max Level: III

Extends underwater breathing time.
Quick Charge

Max Level: III

Decreases crossbow charging time.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:punch.descrip:
Punch

Max Level: II

Increases arrow knockback.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:projectile_pr:
Projectile Protection

Max Level: IV

Reduces projectile damage such as damage from arrows, thrown tridents, ghast and blaze fireballs, etc.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:power.descrip:
Power

Max Level: V

Increases arrow damage.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:piercing.desc:
Piercing

Max Level: IV

Arrows pass through multiple entities.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:multishot.des:
Multishot

Max Level: I

Shoot 3 arrows at the cost of one; only one arrow can be recovered.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:mending.descr:
Mending

Max Level: I

Repair the item while gaining XP orbs.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:lure.descript:
Lure

Max Level: III

Decreases wait time until fish/junk/loot 'bites'.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:luck_of_the_s:
Luck of the Sea

Max Level: III

Increases rate of good loot (enchanting books, etc.)
enchantment_lore.minecraft:loyalty.descr:
Loyalty

Max Level: III

Trident returns after being thrown. Higher levels reduce return time.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:looting.descr:
Looting

Max Level: III

Increases mob loot.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:knockback.des:
Knockback

Max Level: II

Increases knockback.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:infinity.desc:
Infinity

Max Level: I

Shooting consumes no regular arrows.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:impaling.desc:
Impaling

Max Level: V

Trident deals additional damage to mobs that spawn naturally in the ocean. In Bedrock Edition, having impaling on a trident also deals extra damage to players or mobs in water or rain.
Frost Walker

Max Level: II

Turns water beneath the player into frosted ice and prevents the damage the player would take from standing on magma blocks.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:fortune.descr:
Fortune

Max Level: III

Increases certain block drops.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:flame.descrip:
Flame

Max Level: I

Arrows set target on fire.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:fire_protecti:
Fire Protection

Max Level: IV

Reduces fire damage and burn time. Mutually exclusive with other protections.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:fire_aspect.d:
Fire Aspect

Max Level: II

Sets target on fire.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:feather_falli:
Feather Falling

Max Level: IV

Reduces fall damage.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:efficiency.de:
Efficiency

Max Level: V

Increases mining speed. When applied to an axe it increases the chance that the axe may stun a shield, with the base chance being 25% and a 5% increase for each level of efficiency.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:depth_strider:
Depth Strider

Max Level: III

Increases underwater movement speed.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:vanishing_cur:
Curse of Vanishing

Max Level: I

Item destroyed on death.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:binding.descr:
Curse of Binding

Max Level: I

Except when in creative mode, items cannot be removed from armor slots except due to death or breaking.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:cleaving.desc:
Cleaving

Max Level: III

Increases damage and shield stunning.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:channeling.de:
Channeling

Max Level: I

Trident 'channels' a bolt of lightning toward a hit entity. Functions only during thunderstorms and if target is unobstructed with opaque blocks.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:blast_protect:
Blast Protection

Max Level: IV

Reduces explosion damage and knockback.
enchantment_lore.minecraft:bane_of_arthr:
Bane of Arthropods

Max Level: V

Increases damage and applies Slowness IV to arthropod mobs (spiders, cave spiders, silverfish, endermites and bees).
enchantment_lore.minecraft:aqua_affinity:
Aqua Affinity

Max Level: I

Increases underwater mining speed.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:potionre:
Imbued

Max Level: X

When a potion effect is applied while holding the item, tokens of that effect are stored in the item.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:cons:
Consume

Max Level: III

Upon killing an entity there is a 10-30% chance(depends on level) that your hunger will be replenished.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:para:
Paralysis

Max Level: I

Upon hitting a target the target will be frozen and have extremely low attack speed.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:tank:
Tank

Max Level: V

Grants the user higher max health (+1/2 heart per level).
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:expe:
Experience

Max Level: II

Grants the user more experience when killing entities.
Grapnel

Max Level: I

Pulls entity to player or player towards hit.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:tamedpro:
Familiarity

Max Level: I

Prevents this weapon from damaging your pets.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:suga:
Sugar Rush

Max Level: I

Upon killing an entity the wearer becomes fast and has increased jump height.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:snip:
Sniper

Max Level: II

The user does more damage the further they are from their target.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:bowaccur:
Marksman

Max Level: II

Increases accuracy.
enchantment_lore.betterend.end_veil:desc:
End Veil

Max Level: I

Enderman don't get angry, when you look at them.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:noct:
Nocturnal

Max Level: I

When hit during night user gets invisible.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:bowinacc:
Curse of the Trooper

Max Level: I

Accuracy is drastically decreased.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:ende:
Ender Mind

Max Level: I

When the user is hit and is below 4 hearts, they get automatically teleported away (short distance).
enchantment_lore.charm:acquisition.descr:
Acquisition

Max Level: I

Drops go straight into the inventory.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:pois:
Poison Aspect

Max Level: I

Poisons the target on each hit.
enchantment_lore.charm:aerial_affinity.d:
Aerial Affinity

Max Level: I

Increases mining rate when not on ground.
enchantment_lore.charm:tinted.descriptio:
Tinted

Max Level: I

Allows changing the color of the enchanted glint using dye on an anvil.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:behe:
Beheading

Max Level: I

Drop head of some monsters.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:veinmine:
Vein Miner

Max Level: III

Mines all nearby similar.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:blackhol:
Blackhole

Max Level: I

Mined blocks go straight into the inventory.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:ice_:
Ice Aspect

Max Level: II

Slows the target down on each hit.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:curseofe:
Curse of the End

Max Level: III

Teleports you on taking damage.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:doub:
Double Swing

Max Level: I

Chance to swing twice.
enchantment_lore.zoob:from_the_abyss.des:
From the Abyss

Max Level: I

Rewards you for attacking land mobs and punishes you for attacking water mobs.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:filterfe:
Filter Feeder

Max Level: I

Converts bad effects of consumed food to positive effects.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:treefell:
Treefeller

Max Level: III

Chops down whole trees.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:arrow_ch:
Chaos

Max Level: I

Arrows get random potions.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:god_:
God of Thunder

Max Level: I

Has a 5% chance for lightning to summon upon the target.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:autosmel:
Auto Smelting

Max Level: I

Auto smelts mined blocks.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:slippery:
Slippery

Max Level: I

Item has a chance to do dropped when used.
enchantment_lore.moenchantments:soulboun:
Soulbound

Max Level: X

Item will not be dropped on death. Enchantment loses a level.
enchantment_lore.fabricenchantments:rise:
Rise

Max Level: III

Upon being hit, the target floats up in the air for a short duration.
